name: Mosaic (itch) (sunil., Corey Hardt)
description:
A small roguelike in the broughlike style. Collect tiles and seek ancient wisdom.
WASD, Arrows or Swipe to move.

(If playing on mobile: try turning down the browser zoom level to 85-75% for a larger, cleaner image.
In Safari, the "Hide Toolbar" option also helps improve swiping.)

Made for 7DRL 2022 by sunil and Corey Hardt.
